lyrics:
31 contributorshaiti lyricsverse 1 regine chassagne
haïti mon pays
wounded mother i’ll never see
ma famille set me free
throw my ashes into the sea

verse 2 regine chassagne
mes cousins jamais nés
hantent les nuits de duvalier
rien narrete nos esprits
guns can’t kill what soldiers can’t see

verse 3 regine chassagne
in the forest we are hiding
unmarked graves where flowers grow
hear the soldiers angry yelling
in the river we will go

verse 4 regine chassagne
tous les mortsnés forment une armée
soon we will reclaim the earth
all the tears and all the bodies
bring about our second birth

verse 5 will butler
haïti never free
naie pas peur de sonner lalarme
tes enfants sont partis
in those days their blood was still warmsee arcade fire liveget tickets as low as 81you might also like7embed
